ABOUT US

Established in 2021 as an IT solutions development company, PT. Digital Transformasi Teknologi, which is part of the MIB Group, will begin to adopt a new paradigm and theme in mid-2022 as a company that focuses on providing solutions in the cloud and hosting and also provides services in IT Helpdesk for information technology needs. Nowadays, PT. Digital Transformation Technology uses technology resulting from collaboration with MIB Group which has more than 10 years of experience in the field of Information Technology, so that PT. Digital Transformasi Teknologi is evolving into a trusted provider of services and solutions for clients who demand more. Our goal is to help our customers provide the best service experience to their customers and help businesses and organizations be effective in supporting their users, customers and partner.

What We Believe

We believe it matters who provide and serve what clients want. And so we work hard to be the most knowledgeable, most proactive,most service-oriented company in the industry.

Our Vision

To develop and provide innovative solutions and services in the world of information technology with good quality and reliability according to the needs of partners and clients by applying the best in people, process and technology.
Our Mission
  • Building good cooperation with partners and clients while maintaining efficiency and control.
  • Providing and ensuring the availability of quality solutions and services.
  • Focus on partner and client satisfaction in all services provided.
  • Increase sales of solutions, products and services in the market by providing education.
  • Committed to providing solutions and profits for work partners, clients and stake-holders.
Our Value

We have an unbreakable commitment to our brand values. They are our fundamental beliefs. They guide our actions and the way we serve our clients and engage with our communities.
